You can find your SIN on your tax return: You can find your SIN on your tax return or other mail from Service Canada. Service Canada also gave you a card or confirmation letter with your SIN.
You can have more than one principal res: You can have more than one principal residence during the year, but only one at a time.
You can have more than one principal residence during the year, but only one at a time. If you paid costs for several homes at the same time, only include costs for your principal residence.

You will get a notice of assessment in a: You will get a notice of assessment in about 2 weeks. The notice proves you filed taxes, and shows if you must pay tax.
You will not be able to lower your tax b: You will not be able to lower your tax by deducting contributions or costs such as charitable or political donations, medical costs, RRSP or similar contributions

service.name: File taxes to access benefits

start.p1: You may be able to get benefits or money back by filing taxes. The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) has a new service to make filing easier.
